data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
In the minute 4, Play has been interrupted briefly in Ponta Delgada to check on Samuel Dias Lino, who is grimacing with pain.
Santa Clara's Mikel Villanueva has been booked in Ponta Delgada.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 6, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gil Vicente in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 8, Samuel Dias Lino for Gil Vicente is back on the field again.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 10, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 12, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
In the minute 13, Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
In the minute 16, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Free kick Santa Clara.
Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leandrinho (Gil Vicente) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 23, Santa Clara drive upfield and Osama Rashid gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gil Vicente defender.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente in their own half.
Gil Vicente's Antoine Leautey breaks free at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
In the minute 25, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
Important block from the Gil Vicente defence as Osama Rashid fires in a strike for Santa Clara.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
In the minute 27, In Ponta Delgada, Carlos Carvalho (Santa Clara) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Carlos Carvalho (Santa Clara) strikes at Estadio de Sao Miguel but his header is cleared.
In the minute 28, Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Gil Vicente's Samuel Dias Lino is on target but unsuccessful.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica blows against Santa Clara's Carlos Carvalho for offside.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in the half of Gil Vicente.
In the minute 34, Santa Clara to take a throw-in in Gil Vicente territory.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Gil Vicente.
Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Gil Vicente in their own half.
Thiago Santana for Santa Clara gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Gil Vicente a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
Gil Vicente needs to be cautious. Santa Clara have an attacking throw-in.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 42, Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Corner awarded to Santa Clara.
Santa Clara surge into the attack at Estadio de Sao Miguel but Thiago Santana’s header is off-target.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Santa Clara.
Antoine Leautey for Gil Vicente drives towards goal at Estadio de Sao Miguel. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 45, Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gil Vicente awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the home team a throw-in.
Gil Vicente's Nogueira misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 45, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ponta Delgada.
The first-half has ended.
The second-half is now underway.
Throw-in Santa Clara.
Gil Vicente awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 46, Gil Vicente make their first substitution with Renan Oliveira replacing Leandrinho.
In the minute 47, Santa Clara have a goal kick.
Free kick for Santa Clara in their own half.
Gil Vicente have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Free kick Santa Clara.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 51, Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Santa Clara.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gil Vicente to take a throw-in in Santa Clara territory.
In the minute 53, Corner awarded to Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have a dangerous throw-in.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 55, Free kick Gil Vicente.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ruben Fernandes for Gil Vicente who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Gil Vicente are pushing forward but Joao Talocha's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 56, Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Gil Vicente's Ruben Fernandes looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Gil Vicente at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a throw-in for Santa Clara, close to Gil Vicente's area.
Throw-in for Gil Vicente in the half of Santa Clara.
In the minute 60, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nogueira.
Rui Almeida (Gil Vicente) is making a second substitution, with Lucas Mineiro replacing Joao Afonso.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 66, Joel Pereira (Gil Vicente) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards the away team a throw-in.
Can Santa Clara get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gil Vicente's half?
In the minute 68, Nogueira is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Nogueira has recovered and rejoins the match in Ponta Delgada.
Throw-in for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 70, The away team have replaced Antoine Leautey with Kanya Fujimoto. This is the third substitution made today by Rui Almeida.
Free kick for Santa Clara in the half of Gil Vicente.
Thiago Santana (Santa Clara) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 72, Santa Clara have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Santa Clara are coming forward and Rafael Ramos gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gil Vicente goal kick.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 73, Cryzan is on a sub for Jean Patrick Lima dos Reis for Santa Clara.
Santa Clara pushes forward through Thiago Santana, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 74, Santa Clara awarded a free kick in their own half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Cryzan of Santa Clara gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Gil Vicente at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Anderson Carvalho is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Rodrigao Prado (Gil Vicente) has received a yellow card from Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
In the minute 82, Free kick Santa Clara.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
Santa Clara’s Anderson Carvalho is on his feet again at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
In the minute 83, Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Gil Vicente.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
Can Gil Vicente capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 86, Nogueira (Gil Vicente) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica awards Santa Clara a goal kick.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a free kick to Santa Clara in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Gil Vicente.
Gil Vicente have been awarded a corner by Iancu Ioan Vasilica.
Santa Clara awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 89, Ball goes out of play for a Santa Clara goal kick.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica signals a Santa Clara throw-in in Gil Vicente's half.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica will wait an extra 9 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Goal kick for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Ball safe as Santa Clara is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Santa Clara in their own half.
In Ponta Delgada a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Gil Vicente in the half of Santa Clara.
Thiago Santana (Santa Clara) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ponta Delgada.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Full-time! The final score is 0-0.
Julio Rodrigues Romao is replacing Salomao for Santa Clara at Estadio de Sao Miguel.
Daniel Ramos (Santa Clara) is making a third change, with Ukra replacing the possibly injured Anderson Carvalho.
Lourency is replacing Samuel Dias Lino for the away team.
Iancu Ioan Vasilica waits before resuming play because Cryzan for Santa Clara is still down.
Cryzan (Santa Clara) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Costinha.
